strings.string: POL_Installation enables you to setup your STB - Antenna, Channel, Satellite, Transponder, CAS, etc
POL_The Archive allows you to playback or delete the programs you have recorded
POL_The EPG displays program information in time and date order and here you can record them
POL_The Channel List provides you with functions such as sorting and editing TV & Radio channel list
POL_The Media Center allows you to browse and view videos, photos, and music from your storage
POL_STB Info provides the STB status including product name and number, free disk space, etc
POL_The Help gives you assistance using PRISMCUBE RUBY
POL_Get current weather and weather forecast for thousands of cities around the world
POL_View your pictures as a slideshow with nice transition effects
POL_Organize your video content by information associated with the video files
POL_Organize your music collection by information stored in your music file ID tag, like title, artist, album, genre and popularity
POL_Add-ons are packages that add features and functions not normally included with the XBMC Media Center
POL_Most of the Media Center's settings can be configured via the GUI under Settings
POL_The File Manager lets you transfer, copy, delete and rename files and folders on your disk drive, FTP-shares, etc
POL_System Info allows you to see your system status
POL_Check your system resource at a glance
POL_To see all the other funtions, press i button
POL_The Fav. Addons allow you to add your XBMC addons in the sub-menu and access them easily
POL_Set Current Position for East Limit
POL_Set Current Position for West Limit

POL_You can setup Language, Video, Audio, Antenna, Satellite, Channel, Time and Date in the First Installation
POL_Antenna Setup enables you to configure Tuner 1 and Tuner 2
POL_Channel Search menu allows you to scan channels automatically or manually
POL_You can add or delete a satellite here
POL_Here you can add or delete transponders
POL_Most of STB settings can be configured via the GUI under Configuration
POL_The Conditional Access System allows you to setup Smartcard configurations
POL_You can update the firmware of the digital receiver to the latest version, provided by the manufacturer

POL_Press the OK button to search channels

POL_When set to 'Separated', the Tuner 2 receives its own signal input however it will receive only the channel level currently being received by the Tuner 1 when this is set to 'Loopthrough'
POL_When set to 'Same with Tuner 1', both tuners are connected to the same signal source
